title: The Hills Have Zeits 11/13: Cori Bush / Breonna Taylor, Kim Ng, Harry Styles, Lockdown, Georgia
itunes:title: The Hills Have Zeits 11/13: Cori Bush / Breonna Taylor, Kim Ng, Harry Styles, Lockdown, Georgia
description:
On this edition of The Hills Have Zeits Jack and Miles discuss Cori Bush wearing a Breonna Taylor mask and confusing stupid Republicans, Kim Ng has been named the first female GM in Baseball (and major sports in general) for the Marlins, Harry Styles being the first solo male on the cover of Vogue, many states are going back into Lockdown to curb the spread of COVID, and Georgia is more and more confirmed for Joe Biden.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
